name: AgeofEmpires2Helper
0:
”Alexa, ask AoE Helper, what is the unique unit of the Aztecs”
”Alexa, ask AoE Helper, what is the Byzantine unique unit”
”Alexa, ask AoE Helper, tell me about the Franks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. o. e. helper
des:
Want to know the unique unit and its counters of your opponent? Want to know the civilization info of your random civ? No more checking the tech tree mid-game, just ask the Age of Empires 2 Helper.

Includes information on all 35 civilizations in Age of Empires 2 DE. 

You can ask things like:
• "What is the unique unit of the Aztecs"
• "What is the Byzantine unique unit"
• "Tell me about the Franks"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
